video.title: Rosemary & Thyme
video.synopsis: Former constable Laura Thyme and plant pathologist Rosemary Boxer find common ground by catching criminals in this mystery series.

episodes.synopsis: Rosemary Boxer and Laura Thyme, both plant and flower lovers, meet and hit it off while investigating two accidents concerning a very poisonous plant.
episodes.title: And No Birds Sing

episodes.synopsis: Work on restoring the gardens at a country home is interrupted when two skeletons are dug up in the process.
episodes.title: Arabica and the Early Spider

episodes.synopsis: When the rich widow hiring Rosemary and Thyme to restore a garden is murdered, a gardening book written by her late husband may hold answers.
episodes.title: The Language of Flowers

episodes.synopsis: Rosemary and Laura are working to restore lawns at an exclusive boarding school when a body turns up.
episodes.title: Sweet Angelica

episodes.synopsis: Laura and Rosemary investigate the seemingly accidental death of an old friend who ran an urban garden plot being eyed by a developer.
episodes.title: A Simple Plot

episodes.synopsis: The girls are restoring a churchyard and cemetery for a Medieval festival when an unpopular villager is murdered with an arrow through the chest.
episodes.title: The Tree of Death

episodes.synopsis: Rosemary and Laura are hired by a barrister to restore the walled garden of his mansion. It's a big job, but he has access to a cheap labor source.
episodes.title: The Memory of Water: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Rosemary and Laura are hired by a barrister to restore the walled garden of his mansion. It's a big job, but he has access to a cheap labor source.
episodes.title: The Memory of Water: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Laura hopes to heal a rift with her daughter Helena when she is invited to construct a memorial garden near Helena's home in London's Notting Hill.
episodes.title: Orpheus in the Undergrowth

episodes.synopsis: Rosemary's friend invites the gardeners to her house in France. She wants them to restore the 150-year-old garden so she can open it to the public.
episodes.title: They Understand Me in Paris

episodes.synopsis: When Laura and Rosemary go to Stagford Lodge Prep School to investigate dying roses, they get caught up in a strange school ritual.
episodes.title: The Invisible Worm

episodes.synopsis: Rosemary and Laura get a taste of reality TV when they become consultants to the new host of a garden makeover show who is clueless about gardening.
episodes.title: The Gongoozlers

episodes.synopsis: Working on the beautiful Ligurian coast of Italy, Rosemary and Laura are under pressure to finish a restaurant garden for a new establishment.
episodes.title: The Italian Rapscallion

episodes.synopsis: Why is archaeologist Gemma Jackson posing as Rosemary to gain access to Engleton Park, and why is Lord Engleton's once perfect garden so blighted?
episodes.title: Swords Into Ploughshares

episodes.synopsis: The picturesque village of Rowfield is a hotbed of turmoil and dissent as the annual garden contest approaches, and a leading contender is found dead.
episodes.title: Up the Garden Path

episodes.synopsis: While Rosemary and Laura revive an old herb garden for an upcoming royal visit, a young girl is murdered, revealing a darker history of the town.
episodes.title: In a Monastery Garden

episodes.synopsis: The house of a long-dead botanist becomes sought after because it's believed to contain seeds of a plant that may offer a cure for malaria.
episodes.title: Seeds of Time

episodes.synopsis: A noted scholar contracts with the girls to help him restore a garden on his estate, but murder and suicide prove to be distractions.
episodes.title: Agua Cadaver

episodes.synopsis: Rosemary and Laura work on replanting the historic Regent's Park garden, filled with its colorful flowers and an array of permanent visitors.
episodes.title: Three Legs Good

episodes.synopsis: While building a memorial garden, the girls discover the body of a well-known artist and womanizer, along with an abandoned baby.
episodes.title: The Gooseberry Bush

episodes.synopsis: While in Spain with Laura's son, Rosemary and Laura create a trophy garden. In the midst of their trip, a tennis player is murdered.
episodes.title: Racquet Espanol

episodes.synopsis: The girls are contracted to do the landscaping for a traditional amateur theatrical, but members of the cast are murdered.
episodes.title: Enter Two Gardeners

episodes.synopsis: Rosemary and Laura are eager to help eradicate weeds that are choking a valley's garden, but events soon turn sinister when someone dies at a winery.
episodes.title: The Cup of Silence
